feed.title: Visualization Portfolio - STAT 436
feed.subtitle: Student visualizations from the Statistical Data Visualization course at UW Madison.

entry.title: Find Your College Match
entry.content:
Author: Harmohini Sidhu, Mihika Vuppula, Sanvi Kumar, Tanvi Kulkarni, Tirzah Asir, Willow Shi

Click here to visit the interactive app.

The team created this interactive app to assist users in exploring and analyzing educational institutions, providing a streamlined experience through a user-friendly multi-tab layout. Each tab is developed to guide users through different stages of the decision-making process:

Tab 1: Broadly explore institutions or locate them based on commuting accommodations.
Tab 2: Screen and filter candidate institutions using key criteria.
Tab 3: Dive deeper into selected institutions for detailed analysis and insights.
entry.summary: Author: Harmohini Sidhu, Mihika Vuppula, Sanvi Kumar, Tanvi Kulkarni, Tirzah Asir, Willow Shi

entry.title: Anime Insights Explorer
entry.content:
Author: Livia Chandra

Click here to visit the interactive app.

The Anime Insights Explorer is an interactive web application built using R Shiny, designed to help users explore trends, ratings, genres, and production studios within the anime industry. The app enables users to gain insights into how anime has evolved over the years, understand genre popularity, analyze production quality, and identify relationships between key attributes using Principal Component Analysis (PCA). Its intuitive interface and interactive features make it a powerful tool for anime enthusiasts, researchers, and producers to explore and analyze data from the anime world.

entry.title: Student Exam Performance Analysis
entry.content:
Author: Ruikai Cui

Click here to visit the interactive app.

The primary goals of this project are to design a series of interactive and insightful visualizations that explore, compare, and predict key factors affecting student outcomes and the project comprises four interactive pages, Factors Affecting Performance, Demographic Comparisons, Student Clustering and Score Prediction.

entry.title: Student Performance Analysis App
entry.content:
Author: Karen Fuenzalida

Click here to visit the interactive app.

The app allows users to identify different variables that are important in predicting the final exam scores of students, as well as provides an interactive interface where users can adjust the variables and get a predicted exam score.

entry.title: Which Dog Breed Should I Get?

link.title: Which Dog Breed Should I Get?

entry.content:
Author: Karen Fuenzalida

Read the portfolio by clicking here.

Looking for the perfect furry friend? This visualization (inspired by #30DayChartChallenge) has you covered! It breaks down the top 20 dog breeds of 2020, showing shedding levels, grooming needs, and behavioral traits so you know what to expect. Plus, you’ll see how their popularity has changed over time. Simple, clear, and easy to read—everything you need to find the dog that fits your lifestyle.

entry.title: Defensive Space - NFL RB Run Analysis

link.title: Defensive Space - NFL RB Run Analysis

entry.content:
Author: Max Lake, Alexander Scheibe, Yoel Nasi Kazado, Urmi Mehta, Joseph Ho, Miguel Marcial

Click here to visit the interactive app.

In this project, we developed a tool to analyze and visualize the performance of NFL defenses against running back plays. The motivation behind this project stems from the client’s need to evaluate defensive player efficiency and game strategies. By focusing on defensive metrics, such as tackle success rate and Expected Points Added (EPA), the project aims to provide NFL teams with actionable insights for improving defensive tactics.

Our goal was to create an interactive and user-friendly platform to visualize player movements, tackle performance, and defensive efficiency. We leveraged the “NFL Big Data Bowl 2024” dataset from Kaggle and designed features such as play-level visualizations, team and player statistics, and in-depth analyses of key defensive metrics.
entry.summary: Author: Max Lake, Alexander Scheibe, Yoel Nasi Kazado, Urmi Mehta, Joseph Ho, Miguel Marcial

entry.title: Topics of Book Reviews
entry.content:
Author: Willow Shi

Click here to visit the interactive app.

This project is designed to help explore the topics of book reviews shared by readers :)

entry.title: Close Contact Index during the COVID-19 Pandemic

link.title: Close Contact Index during the COVID-19 Pandemic

entry.content:
Author: Wen Ye

Read the portfolio by clicking here.

The visualizations aim to explore how the interaction between people changed throughout the year of 2021 in terms of their social distance in the United States. The interaction between people is quantified by the Close Contact Index(CCI) which measures if two or more devices come within 50 feet of each other within a five minute time period.

entry.title: Video Game Sales Data
entry.content:
Author: David Young

Click here to visit the interactive app.

My goal with this app was to determine how much user and critic scores differed and look at which publishers/ developers create high quality games from a users’ (gamers’) perspective. I was also interested in which developers worked with any given publisher and how many copies of their game they were able to sell and quantify how successful an individual game was.

entry.title: Artistic Relationships
entry.content:
Author: Yijin Guan

Read the portfolio by clicking here.

This dataset is a collection of artworks of the 50 most influential artists of all time. The two visualizations in the form of node-link diagrams are to compare the genres with the artists and their nationalities.
